node.label: Property rights of others
node.hasNote: Property rights of others which hamper exploitation by the applicant

node.label: Ethical Issues
node.hasNote: Does your project touch on ethical issues? (e.g. in relation to methods and data used, persons (not) included or (not) addressed, risks of misinterpretation of results or the risk of negative effects of an application). Please record possible negative effects of an application as potential impact.

node.label: Social and cultural conditions
node.hasNote: (e.g. attitudes, living conditions, practices, traditions, norms, customs, religions)

node.label: Ecological conditions
node.hasNote: (e.g. climate changes, appearance of new pests, water availability )

node.label: Technical and infrastructural conditions or requirements
node.hasNote: (e.g. established technical standards, existing basic technologies, required infrastructures)

node.label: Market conditions
node.hasNote: (e.g. price rates, purchasing power, competitive conditions etc.)
